Introduction

Choi Davi is a South Korean former singer, composer, and professor. She is best known for being part of the co-ed group Bijou and was also a member of co-ed group The Feel.

After leaving Bijou in 2000, Davi went solo with the album "The Natural" in 2003. She officially retired from the entertainment industry in 2007 and now works as a college professor.
